roi_calculation: Very High - Prevents critical security breaches and enables CI/CD.
success_metrics: 100% of security rule tests automated; 90% of auth flows covered by E2E tests.
risk_factors: Complexity of setting up Emulator Suite in CI.
mitigation_strategies: Allocate dedicated DevOps time; Use pre-built GitHub Actions.
business_value: Ensures tenant isolation and secure user onboarding from day one.

roi_calculation: High - Automates critical path user journeys, reducing regression time.
infrastructure_setup: Device farm integration (e.g., Firebase Test Lab).
success_metrics: 80% of core mobile features covered by E2E tests; Offline tests are automated.
risk_factors: Flakiness of UI tests; Device-specific issues.
mitigation_strategies: Implement retry logic for tests; Focus tests on business logic over pixel-perfect UI.
business_value: Accelerates mobile release cycles and improves reliability.

infrastructure_setup: Seeder scripts for large datasets; Mocks for third-party APIs.
success_metrics: Key reporting and filtering scenarios are automated; Google Sheets sync is tested end-to-end.
risk_factors: Managing large test datasets; brittleness of third-party integration tests.
mitigation_strategies: Use stable API contracts for mocks; Version control for test data.
business_value: Ensures accuracy and performance of administrative features.
